alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:48AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockingham, northwestern Caswell, southwestern Pittsylvania and southern Henry Counties, the City of Danville and the City of Martinsville through 830 AM EDT... At 747 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ayersville to near Reidsville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danville... Eden... Reidsville... Martinsville... Wentworth... Yanceyville... and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
